Feline2::

She watched his eyes looked her over.  Her body was the pristeen 
image of her former self. She smiled as he kissed her cheek.
She felt something in her spark jump. 

She wasn't missing just part of her memories of HotRod. She was also 
missing a lot of the programming that Zardus had installed when she 
was first captured and brought to the Allience.  Squizzy had 
installed a program that would keep Feline loyal to the Allience, but 
she wasn't as promiscious or out to win hearts. She was quieter, 
shyer, less bold and less anxious to fight.  

 "Well, if we can't get them back, what then?" she said in a soft 
voice, and looking down. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "Sorry, if this is too much pressure on you. I know this is a bit to
> take in. But I thought you should know the depth of what we had. 
And I
> still have these feelings for you, yes." He looked her over, and 
gave
> her a kiss on the cheek. He didn't want to go to far, not yet.
> "I'll help you recouver the memories, beloved."
